resources.string: Oh! You haven\'t added any factors. If you\'d like to track possible associations with your headaches, touch here.

This is where you make journal entries. Use the sliders on the right to indicate whether or not you\'ve had a headache as well as whether you\'ve experienced your various factors on this day.\n\nEach of your factors is represented by a ball. The ball starts out yellow. As you make more entries in your journal, the ball will begin to turn more green for factors associated with headache-free days and more red for factors associated with headache days.
Add factors that you suspect may influence your headache days and headache-free days. You will track these daily using
Examples of factors include "Gluten", "Alcohol", or "Aerobic Exercise".
Touch here to start adding factors. Factors are things you think might be associated with your headache days or headache-free days. Examples might include \"Gluten\", \"Red wine\", or \"Exercise\".

Headache Wizard is a headache journal designed to help you associate your headache days and headache-free days with factors and events of your choosing. This software is not intended to diagnose or treat any illness. Always use this software under the supervision of a licensed physician.
